trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the recipient of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is the XML Web service, the XML Web service client, or both.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는지 여부를 받는 사람이 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"> </xref> XML 웹 서비스, XML 웹 서비스 클라이언트 또는 둘 다 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> can be applied to either an XML Web service method or a method of a proxy class to an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>는 XML 웹 서비스 검색 방법 또는 XML 웹 서비스 프록시 클래스의 메서드에 적용할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>

trans-unit.source: In either case, the recipient(s) are specified by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 두 경우 모두 받는 사람 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> 속성</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> 으로 지정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To specify that an XML Web service method returns a SOAP header when an exception is thrown during its execution, apply an <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> to the method and set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> property to Fault.
trans-unit.target: XML 웹 서비스 메서드는 실행 중 예외가 throw 될 때 SOAP 헤더를 반환을 지정 하려면 적용 된 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>을 설정 하 고는 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A>속성에 오류.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Version 1.0 of the .NET Framework does not support the Fault value.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 버전 1.0 오류 값을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to the XML Web service client when an exception is thrown by the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"> </xref> XML 웹 서비스 메서드에서 예외가 throw 되 면 XML 웹 서비스 클라이언트에 전송 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"> </xref> XML 웹 서비스에 전송 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to both the XML Web service and the XML Web service client.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"> </xref> XML 웹 서비스와 XML 웹 서비스 클라이언트에 게 보내집니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to the XML Web service client.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"> </xref> XML 웹 서비스 클라이언트에 전송 됩니다.
